item.title: [Cosmos] Listed CVMS in Awesome Cosmos
item.description:
Contribution Description

Successfully listed the Cosmos Validator Monitoring Service (CVMS) in the official Awesome Cosmos repository under the Monitoring Tools section. This project provides a comprehensive monitoring solution for Cosmos SDK-based validators.

View on GitHub View Pull Request
